title: Taking Required Minimum Distributions In This Economic Environment
description: With less than half a year to go until required minimum distributions are due, plus rising inflation and interest rates and a volatile stock market, some retirees may be wondering how to take their RMDs most financially efficient manner. Join MarketWatch's Alessandra Malito and Jody King, director of wealth planning at Fiduciary Trust Company, as they discuss the best strategies.
